statements: DELETE FROM appointment_schedule WHERE doctor_id = 101 AND appointment_date < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM appointments WHERE patient_id = 123 AND appointment_date = '2021-09-15';
DELETE FROM reminders WHERE reminder_time <= '12:00:00' AND appointment_id IN (SELECT appointment_id FROM appointments WHERE doctor_id = 456);
DELETE FROM patients WHERE patient_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 500 AND patient_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM reminders WHERE reminder_sent = TRUE OR reminder_notes IS NOT NULL;
